pr_title: Improve test coverage for file format of file data ingestion

timeline.message: Improve test coverage for file format of file data ingestion

timeline.body:
Better:
```suggestion
The type of the objects in the pipeline is not enforced at runtime. Adding a mapping step causes explicit cast, resulting in a failed job.
```
